casebody.data:
POOLE
v.
STATE of NC 16P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017

Timothy R. Poole, For Poole, Timothy R.

Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, For State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of January 2017 by Plaintiff for Writ of Mandamus:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."
